ogp.title: Prisma | Next-generation ORM for Node.js & TypeScript
ogp.description: Prisma is a next-generation Node.js and TypeScript ORM for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, SQLite, MongoDB, and CockroachDB. It provides type-safety, automated migrations, and an intuitive data model.
